bill_title: Congratulating Ryan Kocer for winning the 2008 ESPY Award for "Best Male Athlete With a Disability".

bill_versions.bill_text: A LEGISLATIVE COMMEMORATION, Congratulating Ryan Kocer for winning the 2008 ESPY Award for "Best Male Athlete With a Disability". WHEREAS, Ryan Kocer is a three-time state wrestling champion; and WHEREAS, Ryan Kocer, despite losing part of his leg in an accident on his family's farm, placed fourth at the South Dakota State B Wrestling Tournament only six months after the accident; and WHEREAS, Ryan Kocer has displayed great courage in athletics; and WHEREAS, the ESPY Award is a national, televised award recognizing excellence in sports performance; and WHEREAS, Ryan Kocer was awarded the ESPY Award for "Best Male Athlete With a Disability": NOW, THEREFORE, BE IT COMMEMORATED, by the Eighty-fourth Legislature of the State of South Dakota, that Ryan Kocer is honored for receiving the 2008 ESPY Award for "Best Male Athlete With a Disability".
